title: The Coded Uprising
outcome: Restored citizens, aided by Harmonists, exploit an old BCI code loophole—triggering temporary score equalization and chaos. Directorate rushes to suppress the uprising, while the public, briefly treated as equals, demands real change.

events.description: Underground activists, using old pilot zone access, discover dormant BCI permissions. Coordinated effort triggers temporary score equalization for several neighborhoods.

Sudden surge in privilege access causes chaos in restricted districts; service access briefly levels. Harmonist insiders covertly supply resistance with vital technical info to weaken Directorate until order is restored.

Directorate scrambles to lock down system; public witnesses hours of life without BCI stratification. Residents experience equal access to jobs, transport, and services for first time since BCI implementation.
Order is reimposed, privileges snapped back, and errant access revoked. Citizens protest fiercely, demanding permanent end to BCI-based exclusions.
Council launches emergency review of BCI vulnerabilities, but tensions deepen as citizens call for full amnesty and radical reform.
